tool_description: Shopello provides an API for a product search engine offering our partners to display products.
name: Shopello
title: Shopello

api_list.name: Product
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopello.p.rapidapi.com/1/products/1582776.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopello.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shopello.p.rapidapi.com/1/products/{id}.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopello.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Related products
Products

optional_parameters.name: order_by
optional_parameters.description: price, name, clicks, popular or relevance

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Which fields to fetch, comma separated

optional_parameters.name: mode
optional_parameters.description: When passed along it will match each word in the query
